page.title: 09EDUCATION
page.content: We have two primary schools,one Junior school,one infant school,one secondary school and one playschool in our block. The playgroup on Bridle road is open 5 days a week Monday-Friday from 9:30 to 12:30 they start at 2 years and leave at 4. Christ the King School is RC.They opened in 1966.They have 363 children and 13 teachers and 5 computers.When they leave they go to St Anselms, Plessington and Upton Hall. Raeburn was opened in 1968 and we have 380 children and 13 teachers.We have a resouce area and we have got two computers.In the resourse we cook and do clay.When we leave we go to Bebington,Bromborough,Eastham,and Wirral.Eastham has 850 pupils and the school was opened in 1960.
